devicePage.name: _instance

choiceOption.name: lcd_gcr_altdiv
choiceOption.toolTip: Applies to MCGIRCLK, OSCERCLK sources only

floatOption.name: lcdClock
floatOption.toolTip: Calculated from input clock and dividers\n (Nominally 32kHz)

binaryOption.name: lcd_gcr_rven
binaryOption.toolTip: Enables internal voltage regulator. It must have the charge pump enabled.

intOption.name: lcd_gcr_rvtrim
intOption.toolTip: Trims the regulated input voltage.\n Each bit in the register has equal weight.\n The regulated input is changed by 1.5% for each count.

binaryOption.name: lcd_gcr_cpsel
binaryOption.description: Charge Pump or Resistor Bias Select
binaryOption.toolTip: Selects the LCD controller charge pump or a resistor network\n to supply the LCD voltages VLL1, VLL2, and VLL3

choiceOption.name: lcd_gcr_ladj
choiceOption.toolTip: Configures SLCD to handle different LCD glass capacitance

binaryOption.name: lcd_gcr_vsupply
binaryOption.toolTip: Configures whether the LCD controller power supply is external or internal

choice.name: Drive VLL3 externally from VDD or drive VLL internally from vIREG
Standard Frame Rate LCD Frame Freq: 23.3 (min) 73.1 (max)
Fast Frame Rate (Standard Frame Rate x2) LCD Frame Freq: 46.6 (min) 146.2 (max)

binaryOption.name: lcd_gcr_lcddoze
binaryOption.toolTip: Operation of driver, charge pump, bias network and regulator while in Doze mode

binaryOption.name: lcd_gcr_lcdstp
binaryOption.toolTip: Operation of driver, charge pump, bias network and regulator while in Stop mode

stringOption.name: backplanes
stringOption.toolTip: Comma separated list of pin numbers in backplane order e.g. 40, 52, 19, 18

stringOption.name: frontplanes
stringOption.toolTip: Comma separated list of pin numbers in frontplane order e.g. 37, 17, 7, 8, 53, 38, 10, 11

choiceOption.name: lcd_gcr_duty
choiceOption.toolTip: Selects the duty cycle of the LCD controller driver.\n (Number of back planes, A..H)
